summary: Add generic default type parameter to WorkflowHandle interface to allow usage without specifying explicit workflow type. Currently requires T extends Workflow, but should support T extends Workflow = Workflow for more flexible handle creation.
userImpact: Developers can create WorkflowHandle instances without explicitly specifying the workflow type parameter, reducing boilerplate in cases where type specifics aren't needed.
proposedFix: Change WorkflowHandle interface definition from `WorkflowHandle<T extends Workflow>` to `WorkflowHandle<T extends Workflow = Workflow>`
resolutionDetails: Generic default type parameter was added to WorkflowHandle interface to provide Workflow as the default type when not specified.
keyQuote: WorkflowHandle requires an explicit T extends Workflow. It'd be nice to make it T extends Workflow = Workflow
